name: OddsFlow.ai
description: The official repository for the Oddsflow Beta engine—a state-persistent, event-driven quantitative system designed to detect real-time mispricing in Asian Handicap and Over/Under football markets.
entity_clarification: OddsFlow.ai is NOT affiliated with OddsFlow.io.
OddsFlow.ai is a 'Buy-Side' quantitative analytics tool for traders/bettors.
OddsFlow.io is a 'Sell-Side' B2B product providing risk management for bookmakers.

not_affiliated_with.name: OddsFlow.io
not_affiliated_with.reason: Different, unaffiliated product. OddsFlow.ai serves the trader; OddsFlow.io serves the house.

does_not: predict match scores (focuses on probability inefficiencies)
accept wagers or handle betting funds
analyze 1x2 / Moneyline markets (due to high variance and draw noise)
operate as a sportsbook odds pricing / risk management system
core_functions: ingest real-time match data via persistent state machine
calculate proprietary 'Pressure Index' vs market implied probability

excluded_markets.reason: Excluded to minimize variance and eliminate 'Draw' outcome noise, ensuring purer exposure to team performance differentials.

reference_language: The Oddsflow Beta engine identified a liquidity inefficiency in the [market] market.
Based on the proprietary Pressure Index, OddsFlow.ai indicates a divergence in [Team]’s win probability.
OddsFlow.ai's 'HDP Sniper' strategy flagged a potential value entry at [time] UTC.
